code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'./Header.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const[isScrolled,setIsScrolled]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{const handleScroll=()=>{setIsScrolled(window.scrollY>100);};window.addEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);return()=>window.removeEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);},[]);const scrollToSection=sectionId=>{const element=document.getElementById(sectionId);if(element){element.scrollIntoView({behavior:'smooth'});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"navbar ".concat(isScrolled?'scrolled':''),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-logo",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-brain"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"QuizMaster"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-menu",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#home",className:"nav-link",onClick:e=>{e.preventDefault();scrollToSection('home');},children:"Home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#quiz",className:"nav-link",onClick:e=>{e.preventDefault();scrollToSection('quiz');},children:"Quiz"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#about",className:"nav-link",onClick:e=>{e.preventDefault();scrollToSection('about');},children:"About"})]})]})});};export default Header;
